lead_paragraph: Officials of the pro-government militias that seized most of Surt on Wednesday said hundreds of Islamic State fighters were hiding in three neighborhoods.

byline.original: By ROD NORDLAND and NOUR YOUSSEF

headline.print_headline: ISIS Fighters Still Lurking in Port City, Libyans Say
headline.main: ISIS Fighters Are Still Lurking in Surt, Libyan Officials Warn

snippet: Officials of the pro-government militias that seized most of Surt on Wednesday said hundreds of Islamic State fighters were hiding in three neighborhoods....
abstract: Libyan officials remain cautious about declaring defeat of Islamic State in city of Surt after pro-government militia take over group's headquarters and other key buildings there.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
